name: Preschool
description: Preschool for children ages 2 - 6 years old. Children do not need to be potty trained prior to enrollment. The school is open year round with open enrollment any time. The curriculum is bilingual featuring Cantonese, Mandarin, and English. Full time 5 days and part time 3 days options are available.

howToGetIt: To being the enrollment process contact the school by telephone or email.
cost: This is a fee based service.
